# List of Italian armies in World War I

This is a list of Italian field armies that existed during World War I:
* 1st Army
* 2nd Army
* 3rd Army
* 4th Army
* 5th Army
* 6th Army
* 7th Army
* 8th Army
* 9th Army
* 10th Army
* 12th Army
See also
* Military history of Italy during World War I
